title: Taiwan's Tsai Ing-wen responds to Xi Jinping's vow of peaceful reunification with China
content:
1. Taiwan's Tsai Ing-wen responds to Xi Jinping's vow of peaceful reunification with China  The Washington Post
  2. Taiwan won't bow to China pressure, leader says - BBC News  BBC News

  4. The Observer view on Xi Jinping’s increasing threats to Taiwan  The Guardian
  5. Taiwan won't be forced to bow to China, says president  Guardian News
